name: github api test
description: This project is built using popular JavaScript technologies such as React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, and it interacts with the GitHub API to fetch a user's profile details, followers, following, and repositories. The application presents the fetched data in an intuitive and visually appealing user interface.The GitHub profile information, including the user's profile picture, username and other relevant details, is displayed prominently using a profile card component. The user's followers, following, and repositories are also displayed in separate cards, providing a summary of the corresponding data, such as counts and relevant details.

name: Imgbb Ap Test
description: Immerse yourself in the world of seamless image uploading and management with imgBB API Test, a dynamic web application built using React and styled with the elegance of Tailwind CSS. This intuitive platform allows users to effortlessly upload, explore, and manage images through the robust imgBB API. Experience a fluid user interface, powered by React's cutting-edge capabilities, coupled with the responsive and visually appealing design crafted using Tailwind CSS. imgBB API Test simplifies image handling, providing a smooth and efficient experience for both developers and end-users alike.

name: next13 typescript with redux
description: Dive into the future of web development with Next.js 13, leveraging the power of TypeScript and Redux, in this groundbreaking project. Seamlessly blending the flexibility of TypeScript with the efficiency of Redux state management, this application offers an unparalleled development experience. Harness the latest Next.js capabilities to build dynamic, server-rendered React applications with ease. Utilizing Redux, manage your application state effortlessly, ensuring a smooth and synchronized user experience across the entire application. With Next.js 13, TypeScript, and Redux combined, you're equipped to create high-performance, type-safe, and scalable web applications that redefine the standards of modern web development.

name: Web Agency With Nextjs
description: "WebAgencyWithNextjs" is a modern website template developed using Next.js, a popular React framework for building fast and responsive web applications. This template incorporates Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework, to create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface. With Next.js providing seamless server-side rendering and Tailwind CSS offering efficient styling, "WebAgencyWithNextjs" ensures a smooth and visually appealing web experience for users. Whether you're showcasing a web agency's services or creating a portfolio, this template offers a solid foundation for building professional and visually stunning websites.

name: Image Gallery Ollyo Task Typescript
description: Welcome to our React JS Image Gallery project—a hands-on experience for budding developers. Dive into a visually captivating grid layout, featuring a standout image as the focal point. Effortlessly reorder images with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality, and efficiently manage your gallery by deleting multiple images. Setting a feature image is a breeze, with the first image from left to right taking the spotlight. Enjoy a seamless user experience with smooth transitions and animations.

name: Dojoteq
description: Our online training platform features live video classes with One-to-One and One-to-Many call options. Students join classes via a mobile app, instructors use a dashboard for scheduling, and admins oversee everything through an admin dashboard. Video sharing is enabled for both in One-to-One, but only for instructors in One-to-Many. We use Stripe for secure payments.

name: Decofetch
description: This E-commerce application specializes in furniture sales, offering various categories and customizable product options. Users can choose different variations and order custom sizes. Payments are processed via Stripe and PayPal. A unique 'Shop The Look' feature allows users to explore room designs and select products by clicking on white dots within the image. We also offer a trade program with discounted pricing for eligible users. An admin dashboard manages all features, allowing dynamic content updates across the site, similar to a CMS system.This E-commerce application specializes in furniture sales, offering various categories and customizable product options. Users can choose different variations and order custom sizes. Payments are processed via Stripe and PayPal. A unique 'Shop The Look' feature allows users to explore room designs and select products by clicking on white dots within the image. We also offer a trade program with discounted pricing for eligible users. An admin dashboard manages all features, allowing dynamic content updates across the site, similar to a CMS system.

name: Course Management Application
description: The university student course registration system is unable to cope with the high volume manual process of recording, retrieving and updating each record at registration time. During peak transaction times for each new semester, registration lines are getting longer as well as each student’s waiting and processing time. So an online student course registration system needs to be developed.In the case of a university course registration process, students will be able to register their courses online. The available courses will be chosen by the students under a user authentication process. Registered courses should be listed under a specific semester for each student.There should be search activity by Semester Name so that we can see the registered courses under that semester.Admin can create a semester and mark the semester as the current semester.Lastly Admin will update the each semester result and result will be published calculating the CGPA of each subject and result will be emailed to students.Each student will be able to see their own result through his registered email id.

name: Uddogi
description: As a proficient full-stack web developer, I proudly serve at Nascenia Ltd., where my expertise shines in maintaining and enhancing VAT management software. Within this dynamic role, I diligently craft and implement innovative features, swiftly troubleshoot bugs, and meticulously refine code for optimal performance. My focal point lies in the intricate realm of VAT calculation, where precision and efficiency converge to deliver seamless solutions for our esteemed clientele.
